frontmatter.title: Spark Certification Study Guide - Part 2 (Application)
frontmatter.description: Part 2 of the Study Guide I created to pass the Spark Certification Exam

mdx.excerpt: This is  Part 2  of the Study guide, focusing on Code and Specific Applications.  For  Part 1  (Core) - click  here We now start diving

items.title: SparkContext
SparkSession
